description: Detects changes to the ClickOnce trust prompt registry key in order to enable an installation from different locations such as the Internet.
author: @SerkinValery
Nasreddine Bencherchali (Nextron Systems)
name: ClickOnce Trust Prompt Tampering
query: (winlog.event_data.TargetObject:/.*\\[Ss][Oo][Ff][Tt][Ww][Aa][Rr][Ee]\\[Mm][Ii][Cc][Rr][Oo][Ss][Oo][Ff][Tt]\\\.[Nn][Ee][Tt][Ff][Rr][Aa][Mm][Ee][Ww][Oo][Rr][Kk]\\[Ss][Ee][Cc][Uu][Rr][Ii][Tt][Yy]\\[Tt][Rr][Uu][Ss][Tt][Mm][Aa][Nn][Aa][Gg][Ee][Rr]\\[Pp][Rr][Oo][Mm][Pp][Tt][Ii][Nn][Gg][Ll][Ee][Vv][Ee][Ll]\\.*/ AND winlog.event_data.TargetObject:(/.*\\[Ii][Nn][Tt][Ee][Rr][Nn][Ee][Tt]/ OR /.*\\[Ll][Oo][Cc][Aa][Ll][Ii][Nn][Tt][Rr][Aa][Nn][Ee][Tt]/ OR /.*\\[Mm][Yy][Cc][Oo][Mm][Pp][Uu][Tt][Ee][Rr]/ OR /.*\\[Tt][Rr][Uu][Ss][Tt][Ee][Dd][Ss][Ii][Tt][Ee][Ss]/ OR /.*\\[Uu][Nn][Tt][Rr][Uu][Ss][Tt][Ee][Dd][Ss][Ii][Tt][Ee][Ss]/) AND winlog.event_data.Details:Enabled)
